text: Manor, a play by Martin Murphy, ran through March to April 2010 at the Tristan Bates Theatre in Covent Garden. It was described as "a fierce and disturbing debut play about North London gangsters by a new talent, well acted by a young cast that deliver a sit-up-and-take-notice ferocity of performance that had me on the edge of my seat" by Aleks Sierz, author of In-yer-face theatre. ==References== Category:British plays Category:2010 plays Category:Plays set in London
title: Manor (play)
